ComicInfo.Summary: As a new version of Shadowpact led by John Constantine protects innocents from zombies, Swamp Thing appears with news of a mysterious garden in Australia that he cannot enter but where people are suffering. Splitting into two groups, Red Hood and Ravager head to Poison Ivy's garden refuge in Gotham where they encounter Cassie and a wounded Jon Kent and the rest of the heroes who have returned from Earth 2. Meanwhile, Constantine's group in Australia runs into an unexpected threat.
